name: Nyctli Swarm
description: The Nyctli Swarm is a large, swirling mass of chaotic fey energy, embodying a malevolent and disorienting presence in combat.
memorable: It can occupy other creatures' spaces and inflicts necrotic damage along with blindness, creating a horrifying ambush.
goals: To ambush and disorient its foes using chaotic tactics.
relations: Often encountered in the company of other chaotic fey creatures.
environment: Typically found in areas of dark woods or shadowy forests.
strengths: High Dexterity makes it difficult to hit, and it has resistances to common forms of physical attacks.
weaknesses: Cannot heal or gain temporary hit points, making it vulnerable to sustained assault.
attacks: Utilizes Stingers that deal piercing and necrotic damage, with potential to blind foes.
most_powerful_ability: Swarm allows it to occupy the same space as foes, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 16, allowing it to detect threats effectively.
skills: Exhibits a high aptitude in perception with a +6 modifier.
additional_information: Immune to conditions such as charmed, frightened, and stunned
Can cast the spell Fear once per day
Swarm's movement can create confusion in combat
Resists bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
spellcasting: Can cast the spell Fear once per day without material components.
test_queries: swirling dark swarm that causes blindness
fey creature with swarm tactics and necrotic damage
chaotic flying creature immune to charm
ambushing swarm that uses fear spells
